Title: Lightning Capabilities
Body:
Content Editor Focused:

Lightning leverages all the hard work done during the Drupal 8 cycle in the Acquia driven Spark initiative. These efforts have all been crucial to Drupal's improved user experience and Acquia includes them as a part of Lightning, providing the best content editor experience available in Drupal 7.

Click on the pencil icon in the menu bar to begin editing the elements of this page right now.

Editorial Workflows:

Custom editorial workflows are a must for content heavy sites, and Lightning provides integrated workflow management for all your content. Configurable and flexible, Lightning provides the workflow experience your customers need.

You can moderate this article's revisions in the "Moderate" tab abover the Article.
You can moderate new content revisions for the entire site through the "My Workbench" link in the administrative menu.

Flexible Layout Control:

Lightning provides a best of breed layout control mechanism for all your page building needs. Lightning also ships with a robust landing page tool that allows for fine grained layout control, block placement and more to be managed through the same workflow management tools used during typical content administration. Lightning expertly weaves the best features of Panels, Panelizer and Workbench together into a unique approach to layout management you won't find anywhere else.

You can get started building a custom landing page right now.

Advanced Content Preview:

Previewing content is one of those hard problems, especially if you want to see what the site might look like a week or month from now, or how it appears on a particular device. Lightning solves these problems enabling the building of groups of content and providing tools to preview your site as if the content were published or viewed from any number of devices. Lightning can prepare your site\'s future content.
